translations: 蓝色的呢绒帽；矢车菊；蓝帽花；苏格兰兵

sentences.sentence: The red and white striped tail on this C-47 Skytrain called "Bluebonnet Belle" is typical of pre-war color schemes, when high visibility arrangements dominated.
sentences.translation: 红色和白色条纹尾巴这架C - 47空中列车称为“ Bluebonnet美人”是典型的战前配色方案，在高能见度的安排为主。
